request.description: Get MQTT proxy status including connection health, configuration, and device info
Get list of currently active MQTT topic subscriptions and patterns
Subscribe to device command topic (automatically subscribed on startup)
Subscribe to a custom test topic
Subscribe to device status topic (example from aws_iot_python_client.py)
Publish a test message to a topic
Publish comprehensive telemetry data (similar to aws_iot_python_client.py example)
Publish health telemetry exactly as done in aws_iot_python_client.py
Send a command to the device (will trigger automatic response)
Send a custom command with parameters
Simulate a command response (normally sent automatically by the device)
